name: Tiziana Rivale
description: '''Letizia Oliva''' (born 13 August 1958), known professionally as '''Tiziana Rivale''', is an Italian singer primarily associated with the [[Italo disco]] style. [[Sanremo Music Festival 1983|In 1983]], she won the [[Sanremo Music Festival]] with the song "[[Sarà quel che sarà]]".
